<item>
      <title>The Plague of Things That Are Too Long</title>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">SB11985417870832073416704582058383192780326</guid>
      <link>http://www.wsj.com/articles/the-plague-of-things-that-are-too-long-1463070060?mod=WSJ_GoogleNews</link>
      <description>Some things are just too long: movies, baseball games, root-canal work. Joe Queenan on a society that doesn’t know when to stop.</description>

<item>
